nodes.excerpt: Rejoy Health is a subscription service for the 20M people with Thyroid Disorder in the US. Rejoy Health members pay a monthly fee for treatment, symptom management & lifestyle coaching.
nodes.title: Rejoy Health - Digital clinic to treat and manage thyroid disorders
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Preki is a B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam, where retailers can source goods through a mobile app and direct vendor links. Their mission is to help both retailers and vendors grow their businesses and offer them the tools necessary to do just that.
nodes.title: Preki - B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: We are glad to introduce Colorgram - an extension that replaces a white Instagram theme with a new colored one! Just choose a new theme from a list of different themes, apply it, and your Instagram will be painted to new cool colors.
nodes.title: Colorgram - Dark mode for Instagram
nodes.author: John Tolley

nodes.excerpt: With Multistream Studio you can simultaneously broadcast to multiple live video services while using your favourite app (like OBS or Zoom), video camera, hardware encoder or mobile phone. It acts like a middleman copying your stream to multiple destinations.
nodes.title: Multistream Studio - Broadcast to multiple video services from any software

nodes.title:
All of Momentum's outperformance vs. Value since the start of the pandemic last year has been given back after the relative crash over the last few weeks.

The 27% relative drawdown vs. value is the largest ever since the inception of the momentum ETF in 2013.
